### IProfileDrive.IsUnicodeSupported property
</br>


#### Gets a value indicating whether Unicode output is fully supported.

```csharp
public bool IsUnicodeSupported { get; }
```

### Property Value

`true` if Unicode is supported; otherwise `false`.
